amendment.description: To conduct a study on the need for national centers of excellence on unmanned aerial vehicles.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3327 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3327 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Daschle. (consideration: CR S7152-7160) To conduct a study on the need for national centers of excellence on unmanned aerial vehicles.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3327 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3327 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Daschle.
